DOC.brief_summary: This study is being conducted to see if adding GW679769 (casopitant) to ZOFRAN will significantly decrease the number of patients who experience nausea and vomiting after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Casopitant And ZOFRAN To Prevent Post Operative Nausea And Vomiting In Women
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: History of PONV (postoperative nausea and vomiting) and/or motion sickness. Have not smoked for the last 6 months. Having certain abdominal, breast, thyroid or shoulder surgery. Exclusion criteria: Pregnant or breastfeeding. Have certain preexisting medical conditions or take certain medications.
